title: Passion for Pinot Party
description: Celebrate an afternoon of exceptional Pinot Noir at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for $95 per person. Enjoy a curated selection of 30+ Pinot Noirs, featuring cult and fan favorites like Rochioli, Kosta Browne, Sea Smoke, Martinelli, and Kistler. Each wine will be thoughtfully paired with gourmet small plates crafted by Chef Josh and Chef Lee, creating an unforgettable tasting experience. With limited space available, this is a must-attend event for Pinot lovers!
